amendment.description: An amendment numbered 96 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used for 18F within the Technology Transformation Service at GSA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
